education.institution: Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH)
Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH)

highlights: Achieved top grades in Deep Learning and NLP coursework

work.name: SK hynix
highlights: Worked as an intern in the Mobile FTL team
Conducted a project titled 'Enhancing Mobile FTL Performance: An AI Model for User Command Prediction'
Developed an FTL simulator to analyze FTL mechanisms and implemented an AI-based model to predict user commands, improving overall FTL performance

awards.title: Grand Prize, SK hynix Internship Program
awards.summary: Received the Excellence Award for ranking 1st place in the individual project competition during the SK hynix Internship Program. Conducted a project titled “Enhancing Mobile FTL Performance: An AI Model for User Command Prediction.”

awards.title: Popular Award, Undergraduate Research Project II
awards.awarder: POSTECH Computer Science and Engineering Department
awards.summary: Received the Popular Award in Research Project II (Undergraduate Capstone Research Course) for outstanding presentation and project execution on improving Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) performance.

awards.title: National Science & Technology Scholarship
awards.summary: A merit-based scholarship awarded to outstanding students in science and engineering fields, providing full tuition support for undergraduate studies.

awards.title: Excellence Award, MINI-I-CORPS
awards.summary: In a startup competition, proposed a Mobile Grocery System utilizing Demand-Responsive Transportation (DRT) to improve shopping accessibility for elderly residents in rural areas.

awards.title: Global Leadership Program Scholarship
awards.awarder: POSTECH Computer Science and Engineering Department
awards.summary: A scholarship that selects excellent students in the department and provides education-related expenses.

publications.name: SPARTA: Scalable and Principled Benchmark of Tree-Structured Multi-hop QA over Text and Tables
publications.publisher: Sungho Park, Jueun Kim, Wook-Shin Han
publications.summary: SPARTA is a fully automated SQL-centric pipeline that constructs a tree-structured multi-hop QA benchmark by unifying structured and unstructured evidence from tables and text into a single relational representation.

references.name: Professor Wook-Shin Han
references.reference: Full Professor, Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH), Pohang, South Korea. Email: wshan@dblab.postech.ac.kr

projects.name: Retrieval Enhancement in OTT-QA Model
projects.summary: Development of an Open Table and Text Question Answering (OTT-QA) model integrating information from both unstructured text and structured tables for enhanced QA performance.
highlights: Received the Popular Award for outstanding presentation and project execution

projects.name: How to Build a Correct Text-DB QA Benchmark
projects.summary: Proposed the Text-DB QA Task, which answers queries using both unstructured text and structured databases, and established a baseline and benchmark for it.
